医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
巴西研究人员创造了对抗结核病的尖端纳米粒子武器巴西圣保罗州立大学 (UNESP) 的研究人员开发了一种低成本技术，涉及载有抗生素和其他抗菌化合物的纳米颗粒，可用于对大多数结核病病例的细菌感染进行多次攻击，并报告在《碳水化合物聚合物》杂志上发表的一篇文章中。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231220/Brazilian-researchers-create-cutting-edge-nanoarticle-weapon-against-tuberculosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231220/Brazilian-researchers-create-cutting-edge-nanoarticle-weapon-against-tuberculosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d4073fc7-dd10-499a-aec5-178ef60e7625 Wed, 20 Dec 2023 17:04:48 -0500 Brazilian researchers create cutting-edge nanoparticle weapon against tuberculosis
240 万美元拨款资助 PAL 项目，以建立言语病理学的多样性田纳西大学健康科学中心听力学和言语病理学系和范德比尔特大学听力和言语科学系已获得 2,399,454 美元的赠款，用于资助一个为期五年的项目，以满足训练有素的言语专业人员的多样性需求-语言病理学。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231220/2424-million-grant-to-fund-project-PAL-for-building-diversity-in-speech-language-pathology.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231220/2424-million-grant-to-fund-project-PAL-for-building-diversity-in-speech-language-pathology.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2cd2165d-ef5a-4937-b8db-09dc6698e867 Wed, 20 Dec 2023 16:54:46 -0500 $2.4 million grant to fund project PAL for building diversity in speech-language pathology
饮食转向少加工食品可显着降低女性的甘油三酯《营养》期刊的一项研究模拟了饮食变化对育龄女性甘油三酯水平的影响，结果显示，随着最低限度加工食品和富含 omega-3 食物的摄入量的增加，甘油三酯水平会显着降低。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231220/Dietary-shifts-to-less-processed-foods-significantly-lower-triglycerides-in-women.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231220/Dietary-shifts-to-less-processed-foods-significantly-lower-triglycerides-in-women.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=321cef6b-579c-4b80-a3c0-0fade3306eca Wed, 20 Dec 2023 15:08:00 -0500 Dietary shifts to less processed foods significantly lower triglycerides in women
数字健康算法大幅减少坦桑尼亚儿童的抗生素使用Nature Medicine 的一项研究表明，ePOCT+ 数字健康算法显着减少了坦桑尼亚 15 岁以下儿童的抗生素处方，凸显了其在对抗抗菌素耐药性方面的潜力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231220/Digital-health-algorithm-drastically-cuts-antibiotic-use-in-Tanzanian-children.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231220/Digital-health-algorithm-drastically-cuts-antibiotic-use-in-Tanzanian-children.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ec320528-2424-4dbd-bbdb-cbb3c416f716 Wed, 20 Dec 2023 15:02:00 -0500 Digital health algorithm drastically cuts antibiotic use in Tanzanian children
深度学习解锁新的抗生素类别，彻底改变抗击耐药性的斗争《自然》杂志的一项研究采用深度学习来分析化学子结构，从而发现了新的抗生素结构类别，展示了人工智能在加速抗生素开发方面的潜力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231220/Deep-learning-unlocks-new-antibiotic-classes-revolutionizing-the-fight-against-resistance.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231220/Deep-learning-unlocks-new-antibiotic-classes-revolutionizing-the-fight-against-resistance.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=aed5ef80-f453-4ff6-bb78-b403a5168c0b Wed, 20 Dec 2023 13:52:00 -0500 Deep learning unlocks new antibiotic classes, revolutionizing the fight against resistance
NHS COVID-19 应用程序研究显示数字接触者追踪在预测病毒传播风险方面的有效性《自然》杂志上的一项综合研究分析了来自 NHS COVID-19 应用程序的超过 700 万个数据点，揭示了数字接触者追踪如何根据暴露时间和距离来有效预测 SARS-CoV-2 传播风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231220/NHS-COVID-19-app-study-shows-digital-contact-tracings-effectness-in-predicting-virus-transmission-risks.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231220/NHS-COVID-19-app-study-shows-digital-contact-tracings-effectness-in-predicting-virus-transmission-risks.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9e186737-e143-44ea-9853-d763a3f257b3 Wed, 20 Dec 2023 13:44:00 -0500 NHS COVID-19 app study shows digital contact tracing's effectiveness in predicting virus transmission risks
简化溶出度测试：Opt-Diss 紫外光纤系统软件版本 3.20 提供简化的流程和扩展的功能实验室制药仪器领域享有盛誉的领导者 Distek, Inc. 很高兴地宣布发布 Opt-Diss - 用于溶出度测试的原位光纤紫外系统的最新软件更新：版本 3.20。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231220/Simplifying-Dissolution-Testing-Opt-Diss-UV-Fiber-Optic-System-Software-Rev-320-Delivers-Streamlined-Processes-and-Expanded-能力.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231220/Simplifying-Dissolution-Testing-Opt-Diss-UV-Fiber-Optic-System-Software-Rev-320-Delivers-Streamlined-Processes-and-Expanded-功能.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=077a180d-b440-4e13-9232-4d8602f6c243 Wed, 20 Dec 2023 11:22:00 -0500 Simplifying Dissolution Testing: Opt-Diss UV Fiber Optic System Software Rev. 3.20 Delivers Streamlined Processes and Expanded Capabilities
Metrion Biosciences 完成 370 万英镑新股权融资专业离子通道 CRO 和药物发现公司 Metrion Biosciences Limited (Metrion) 今天宣布，已获得 350 万英镑的新股权融资，其中包括来自主要投资者 Maven Capital Partners (Maven) 的 250 万英镑和现有的 100 万英镑。投资者，Gresham House Ventures（Gresham House）。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231220/Metrion-Biosciences-closes-c2a337m-new-equity-financing.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231220/Metrion-Biosciences-closes-c2a337m-new-equity-financing.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=076516b4-5324-4bdd-932d-4cacab827c18 Wed, 20 Dec 2023 08:35:00 -0500
“我只是在等死”：社会保障回扣让一些人无家可归在联邦政府首次切断她的残疾福利一年多后，丹尼斯·伍兹每晚开车前往佐治亚州萨凡纳周围的购物中心、卡车停靠站和停车场，寻找一个安全的地方可以在她的雪佛兰中睡觉。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231220/e28098I-am-just-waiting-to-diee28099-Social-Security-clawbacks-drive-some-into-homeless.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231220/e28098I-am-just-waiting-to-diee28099-Social-Security-clawbacks-drive-some-into-homeless.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e5cd4165-564c-486b-9756-5c9cac49b040 Wed, 20 Dec 2023 08:20:04 -0500 ‘I am just waiting to die’: Social Security clawbacks drive some into homelessness
一项新的测试可以为关节炎患者节省时间、金钱和痛苦。但它会被使用吗？艾琳·莫里 (Erinn Maury) 知道 Remicade 不适合帕蒂·舒尔特 (Patti Schulte)，医生在马里兰州米勒斯维尔的诊所接诊了一位类风湿性关节炎患者。舒尔特肿胀、疼痛的关节对 Enbrel 或 Humira 这两种同类药物没有反应。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231220/A-new-test-could-save-arthritis-患者-time-money-and-pain-But-will-it-be-used.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231220/A-new-test-could-save-arthritis-患者-time-money-and-pain-But-will-it-be-used.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9097d2a5-7688-4d30-88ca-b07e23cc08c9 Wed, 20 Dec 2023 08:12:53 -0500 A new test could save arthritis patients time, money, and pain. But will it be used?
